ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet:
* Iron Raptor leaned as far back from Nemesis Enforcer as she could, almost creating a dent in the wall behind her.
She growls at him as he reached towards her

* Iron Raptor leaned as far back from Nemesis Enforcer as she could, almost creating a dent in the wall behind her.
She growls at him as he reached towards her neck with the dreaded bug, tensing to the extent that almost every muscle in her body ached.
Iron Raptor tried to move so that her neck wasn't accessible to Nemesis but there was no way that she could, closing her optics tightly and cringing. Waiting to feel the bite of the bug and the increasing pain...only to not feel it at all?
She opened one of her optics and looked towards Nemesis, both of her optics snapping open as she saw what she did.
It was almost as if he was falling backwards but not all they way, lice the air was holding him up half way. And his mouth was open to, but there was no sound coming out.
But then she saw him slowly lower to the floor, still trying to recover from see him his scream with no sound.
What in the Pit was going on?!
Iron Raptor looked around but saw nothing, nothing at all.
Then leaned forward, if it wasn't for the restraint she would have fallen onto her face.
Staring down at Nemesis she then the only things stopping her from falling forward...open!!!
Iron Raptor yelled in surprise as he body suddenly pitched forward but then sighed when she caught herself, steadying herself with her legs but then standing at full height and looking around.
Something was going on here that she should be aware of and she knew it, but what?
Rubbing her sore wrist with her other hand she looked around, puzzled to the extreme.*
